definition: horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
thick pole/bar/rod/thick line/to mark with a thick line/to sharpen (knife)/(old) coffin-bearing pole

sentences.english: The top "rung" can be also be shifted higher to increase the length of the top point.
sentences.chinese: 頂部“橫槓”同樣可以上移來增加鞋帶剩餘部分。

sentences.english: Therefore, we don't have a cross through the d.
The bar underneath usually does mean bending.
sentences.chinese: 下面的橫槓確實經常表示壓音。
